about_the_game:
Help the aliens invade Earth in this procedurally-generated, infinite, 3D shooter game. Featuring fully destructible cityscapes and a wide variety of destruction-wreaking, sometimes comical, weapons. Visit (rampage and destroy) the cities of future Earth and Mars block by block. Chaotic battle scenes as rubble and military vehicles pile up. Customize your UFO and character with a wide choice of ships, wraps and character accessories, all available for free by completing in-game missions.

Key Features/Modes

Campaign Mode:
"Battle through iconic buildings and landmarks while finding unique, random weapons to devastate procedurally generated cities. Seek out new weapons hidden across the map and unleash chaos."

Missions Mode:
"Complete randomized tasks across maps with procedurally generated terrains, ocean shapes, and random cityscapes from European-style towns to futuristic skyscrapers with anti-air defenses and enemies vary in placement, quantity, and type. Expect the unexpected with enemies selected from a vast pool, ranging from helicopters and jets to stealth bombers and more..."

Customs Mode:
"Edit, build, and expand using saved procedural generation seeds. Create new maps, modify existing ones, and craft your ultimate battlefield."

name: UFO ENEMY KNOWN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 / AMD FX-4300 or equivalent (4 cores of at 2.5GHz+)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 265 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Sound card
  • Additional Notes: Game may run on lower end systems, especially in lower graphics settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or above.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Sound card
  • Additional Notes: Game can make use of high end systems with high resolution (4K) and high frame rates (240 FPS+)

Visit (rampage and destroy) cities of future Earth and Mars block by block. Chaotic battle scenes as rubble and vehicles pile up.
